headline: GATAN ION BEAM COATER (IBC)
description: Ion Beam Coater  Ion Beam Coater (IBC) designed to produce high-quality conductive coatings on   SEM or TEM specimens
keywords: Sem sample prep carbon evaporators desk top coaters
categories.lvl2: Microscopes  >  Sample Preparation Equipment > Sample Coaters
specstable:
Manufacturer Gatan
Model 681
Coating Method Sputtering Only
Gas Flow Control Manual
Vacuum Metering Yes
Current Metering Yes
Thickness Monitoring
Model Gatan 681-2000FTM
Mechanical Vacuum Pump Included Yes
Model MVP015
Accessories
  • LN2 trap
  • Gatan thickness monitor
Other Information
  • Dual ion sources
  • Includes 4 targets:
    1. gold
    2. gold/palladium
    3. carbon
    4. chromium
  • Compact dry vacuum system consisting of the diaphragm and molecular drag pumps.
  • Penning gauge vacuum monitoring
  • The Whisperlok stage, a modified version of Gatan’s patented Whisperlok™ mechanism, enables the specimen not only to rotate but to rock through a variable angle set by a front-panel control.
  • The Whisperlok accepts a single specimen up to 36 mm in diameter or multiples of smaller-diameter holders.This stage permits specimen exchange in less than 30 seconds
Extended Description Details at 681 Ion Beam Coater Front Panel.jpg
Power Requirements 120/240 V 3.0 A 1.5 A(2) 50/60 Hz 1 Phase
CE Marked YES
Condition Excellent
